bio: Within the ancient halls of Markarth, Lyell Ghattz emerged as a Dremora monk, guided by a desire to master unarmed combat. A practitioner of hand-to-hand combat and restoration magic, his journey faced an infernal trial – a fear of fire. Training with a fire mage, he embraced the flames, emerging as a monk unafraid of the scorching trials that awaited.
name: Lyell Ghattz
